allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix build errors for Vercel deployment

- Remove non-existent @storyblok/types import and define StoryblokImageBlock locally
- Add ''revalidate: 60'' to all page routes to enable static generation
- Change fetch cache strategy to ''force-cache'' for Storyblok API calls
- Remove unused NextPage imports

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
